data.message: Hi! I have a problem with my former facebook account ... I'm not going to reset the phone ... it sends me a reset code on my phone and when I reset my password I'm giving a bug. What can I do to get it back?

replies.message: Hi Nicoleta. You can learn how to remove or recover an old account you can't log into here: http://bit.ly/2sKus4L. Please keep in mind that it's against our Community Standards to maintain more than one personal account. -William
